lore: Syndra is a fearsome dark mage with incredible power at her command. As a child of Ionia, she disturbed the village elders with her prodigious but reckless use of magic. They sent her away to be trained under strict supervision, but she quickly surpassed her mentor and discovered he was restraining her powers. Betrayed and disgusted by such cowardice, Syndra eliminated her teacher and struck out to destroy all who would try to limit her potential, dark spheres in hand.
title: the Dark Sovereign
blurb: Syndra is a fearsome dark mage with incredible power at her command. As a child of Ionia, she disturbed the village elders with her prodigious but reckless use of magic. They sent her away to be trained under strict supervision, but she quickly...
allytips: To maximize your ultimate's damage use it when there are many spheres on the battlefield.
After you hit an enemy champion with Force of Will follow up with Dark Sphere, they'll be slowed and have a hard time avoiding it.
Get one of your spells to rank 5 as quickly as possible, they gain powerful bonus effects at max rank.

passive.name: Transcendent
passive.description:
Spells gain extra effects at max rank.

Dark Sphere: Sphere's lifetime is increased to 8 seconds.
Force of Will: Deals 20% bonus true damage.
Scatter the Weak: Spell width increased by 50%.
Unleashed Power: Range increased by 75.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Spells gain extra effects at max rank. Dark Sphere: Sphere's lifetime is increased to 8 seconds. Force of Will: Deals 20% bonus true damage. Scatter the Weak: Spell width increased by 50%. Unleashed Power: Range increased by 75.

enemytips: Get boots early when playing against Syndra, they'll help you avoid many of her spells.
Attack Syndra after she's used Scatter the Weak, it has a long cooldown so she'll be vulnerable.
At max rank Syndra's spells gain bonus effects and change in appearance.
name: Syndra

spells.name: Dark Sphere
spells.description: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.
spells.tooltip:
Conjures a Dark Sphere dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The sphere remains for {{ f1 }} seconds and can be manipulated by Syndra's other abilities.

This spell can be cast while moving.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Conjures a Dark Sphere dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The sphere remains for {{ f1 }} seconds and can be manipulated by Syndra's other abilities. This spell can be cast while moving.

spells.name: Force of Will
spells.description: Syndra picks up and throws a Dark Sphere or enemy minion dealing magic damage and slowing the Movement Speed of enemies.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Syndra picks up and throws a Dark Sphere or enemy minion dealing magic damage and slowing the Movement Speed of enemies.
spells.tooltip:
First Cast: Grabs target Dark Sphere or enemy minion. If no target is selected, grabs nearest Dark Sphere.

Second Cast: Throws the grabbed unit. Enemies hit take {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ f2 }} seconds.

This spell can be cast while moving.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: First Cast: Grabs target Dark Sphere or enemy minion. If no target is selected, grabs nearest Dark Sphere. Second Cast: Throws the grabbed unit. Enemies hit take {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ f2 }} seconds. This spell can be cast while moving.

spells.name: Scatter the Weak
spells.description: Syndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Syndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned.
spells.tooltip:
Knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to them and any enemies they collide with.

Dark Spheres that are knocked back stun all enemies in their path for {{ e2 }} seconds.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to them and any enemies they collide with. Dark Spheres that are knocked back stun all enemies in their path for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Unleashed Power
spells.description: Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres.
spells.tooltip:
Draws upon Syndra's full cataclysmic power, harnessing Dark Spheres to deal magic damage to target enemy Champion. Unleashed Power manipulates the three Dark Spheres orbiting Syndra, in addition to up to 4 Dark Spheres previously created.

Damage per sphere: {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}).
Minimum total damage: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}).
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Draws upon Syndra's full cataclysmic power, harnessing Dark Spheres to deal magic damage to target enemy Champion. Unleashed Power manipulates the three Dark Spheres orbiting Syndra, in addition to up to 4 Dark Spheres previously created. Damage per sphere: {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}). Minimum total damage: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}).
